lora模块参数配置
id1: 0x0002
id2: 0x0003
信道：0x1e
空中速度：9.6k

终端：
设置时间：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 18 11 00 10 F3 00 20 11 F4 00 16 15 F5 00 48 00 F6 00 01 10 97 5D A3 08

读温湿度：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 10 01 28 1C 3F 90 8F

读电量：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 F0 06 04 1E 24 90 8F

功能码错误：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 15 F0 06 04 1F 9C 90 8F 

起始地址错误：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 F0 0F 04 18 74 90 8F 

数据长度错误：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 F0 06 45 DE 14 90 8F




网关：


读温湿度：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 FD 17 10 01 28 4C 2B 90 8F 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 10 01 28 1C 3F 90 8F 

增加终端地址：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 FD 18 46 10 10 F7 00 00 00 F7 00 00 00 F7 00 00 00 F7 00 00 02 D9 CF FF 31   
删除终端地址：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 FD 18 46 11 10 F7 00 01 00 F7 00 02 00 F7 00 03 00 F7 00 04 01 6B CA A3 08    

数据帧：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 10 01 28 01 81 00 1E 02 81 00 28 01 81 00 1F 02 81 00 29 01 81 00 20 02 81 00 2A 01 81 00 21 02 81 00 2B 01 81 00 22 02 81 00 2C A1 29 7D DC

数据帧：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 10 01 28 01 81 00 2E 02 81 00 28 01 81 00 2F 02 81 00 29 01 81 00 20 02 81 00 2A 01 81 00 21 02 81 00 3B 01 81 00 22 02 81 00 3C 09 03 7D DC
 
写0x4002:00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 FD 18 40 02 04 03 00 00 01 26 AC 21 3A   
 
读0x4001:00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 FD 17 40 01 04 4D E7 90 D3  

写0x4003：00 02 1e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 FD 18 40 03 04 03 00 00 01 27 7D 21 3A     
数据转发：00 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 01 17 10 01 28 1C 3F 13 2D 

ATE0
AT+CPIN?
AT+CGATT?
AT+CASSLCFG=0,"SSL",0
AT+CNACT=0,1
AT+CASWITCH =0,1
AT+CAOPEN=0,0,"TCP","dtu.heclouds.com",1811
AT+CNACT=0,0

AT+SGNSCFG="NMEAOUTPORT",2,115200

AT+SGNSCMD=2,1000,0,1


a0 =(D*G^2 - C*G*H - B*I*G + B*H^2 - D*F*H + C*F*I)/(I*F^2 - 2*F*G*H + G^3 - I*N*G + N*H^2)
 
 
a1 =(C*G^2 - B*G*H + B*F*I - D*F*G - C*I*N + D*H*N)/(I*F^2 - 2*F*G*H + G^3 - I*N*G + N*H^2)
 
 
a2 =(D*F^2 - C*F*G - B*H*F + B*G^2 - D*N*G + C*H*N)/(I*F^2 - 2*F*G*H + G^3 - I*N*G + N*H^2)
